item.title: Rand Paul Compared Trump Cartel Strike To Lynching, Backed Obama Droning Americans
item.description: Sen. Rand Paul harshly criticized a Trump administration strike on a Venezuelan cartel, but supported Obama's drone strike of Americans.

item.title: Watch Norah O’Donnell’s Justice Barrett ‘Interview’ To Understand How The Media Lie
item.description: From beginning to end, O'Donnell treated her 'interview' with Justice Barrett as an opportunity to try and discredit the Supreme Court.

item.title: Axios: Worst Part About Gruesome N.C. Train Stabbing Is People Noticing
item.description: 'MAGA influencers are drawing repeated attention to violent attacks to elevate the issue of urban crime.'

item.title: DC Would Get Much Better If More Politicians Threatened Punches Like Scott Bessent
item.description: Sometimes solving problems requires the men running the country to put their money and meat hooks where their mouths are.

item.title: CA Woman Charged After Allegedly Casting Two Votes On Dog’s Behalf
item.description: Talk about being bad to the bone! A California woman is facing jail time after she allegedly registered her dog to vote and cast ballots on her pooch’...
